business.headline: From record highs to a five-month slide: Where are Sensex, Nifty headed?From record highs to relentless losses, Dalal Street's dream run has turned into a nightmare in just a few months. Is there any relief in sight for investors or is there more pain ahead?

Zerodha's Nithin Kamath flags sharp drop in trading activity amid market crashThe stock market fell sharply on Friday, with the Sensex dropping 1,414 points and the Nifty slipping below 22,150. The heavy selling wiped out nearly Rs 9 lakh crore in market value.

Citigroup employee's typo nearly led to $81 trillion blunder. Details hereThe payment was initially overlooked by two employees before a third employee caught it. Citi later reported the incident as a 'near miss' to the Federal Reserve and the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC).

Don't miss these money deadlines in March 2025: Special FDs, ITR, and more In case you have missed reporting income or made an error in your ITR, you can still fix it. The final deadline for filing an  updated return (ITR-U) is March 31, 2025.

Sensex falls 1,400 points as trade war fears rattle D-Street, Rs 9 lakh crore goneStock market crash: During today's trading session, Dalal Street plunged as Sensex tumbled 1,414 points and Nifty sank below 22,150 amid global trade war fears and foreign sell-off, erasing nearly Rs 9 lakh crore in market value.
GDP grows at 6.2% in Q3 2024-25, up from 5.6% in Q2For the financial year 2023-24, India recorded a real GDP growth rate of 9.2%, marking the highest annual growth in the past 12 years.

Nifty posts longest monthly losing streak in 29 years, over Rs 90 lakh crore goneForeign outflows, weak earnings and global uncertainty have wiped out over Rs 90 lakh crore in investor wealth from  since September 2024, when Nifty hit an all-time high of 26,277.35.

Technicolor India shuts down, over 3,000 employees affected The company currently employs 3,200 people across India, with nearly 3,000 in Bengaluru alone. The sudden move has left several employees in shock.

RuPay Debit Select Card: Check new features effective from April 1, 2025RuPay Debit Select Cardholders can enjoy one complimentary domestic airport lounge visit each quarter and two international lounge visits a year at participating lounges (conditions apply).

India needs tariff cuts, reforms to boost investments: World Bank The World Bank report titled 'Economic Memorandum India' also highlights that for India to become a high-income country by 2047, its per capita income must grow nearly eight times current levels.

What's your best asset in 20s? Not stocks or trading, says Radhika GuptaRadhika Gupta cautioned that young professionals might be focusing on passive income too early. She believes that the best investment in your 20s is not stocks or trading but your talent and time.

Smallcap, midcap indices set for worst month in 5 years. More pain ahead?In 2025 so far, mid-cap stocks have fallen 16%, while small-cap stocks have slumped 21%. In comparison, the benchmark Nifty 50 is down 6.7%.

NPCI introduces UPI Lite's 'Transfer Out' feature. All details hereAll issuer banks and UPI Apps must implement the required changes by March 31, 2025, as mentioned in NPCI's circular dated February 21, 2025

EPFO retains 8.25% interest rate on provident fund deposits for 2024-25In February 2024, the Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) had increased the interest rate on EPF marginally to 8.25 per cent for 2023-24, from 8.15 per cent in 2022-23.

Explained: Why IT stocks like TCS, Infosys, Tech Mahindra are falling todayTech Mahindra was the biggest loser among IT stocks, down nearly 5.5% at the time publishing this report. Wipro was also down nearly 5%. Major IT firms such as TCS, Infosys and HCLTech were also down nearly 4% each.

Portfolio in red? Top mutual funds to consider amid stock market downturnInvestors are now looking for safer investment options as the markets have seen a huge correction. Mutual funds that balance risk and growth are a preferred choice among many.

Explained: Why Premier Energies shares tumbled up to 8% today The company's share price fell to a day's low of Rs 850 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). At around 12 pm, shares of Premier Energies were down 4.46% to Rs 881.80.

Ever heard of an alimony calculator? Here's how it worksAn alimony calculator is a tool that helps in determining the estimated financial support one spouse may need to pay the other after a divorce or separation.
India, EU aim to seal free trade pact by year-endThe EU is India's biggest trade partner in goods, with trade hitting $137.5 billion in 2023-24, nearly doubling in ten years.
Meta fires 20 employees for leaking internal information to mediaThe latest round of firings came following a recent series of reports based on Mark Zuckerberg's meetings with employees.

Stock market crash: 5 things investors should know as Sensex plunges 1,400 pointsStock market crash: Retail investors, already grappling with losses, are left wondering whether this correction will continue or if a recovery is on the horizon. Here are 5 things investors need to know
Sensex crashes 1,400 points: Why stock market is falling todayAt 12:53 PM, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 1,371.42 points at 73,241.01, while the NSE Nifty50 dropped 421.15 points to 22,123.90.

Bitcoin tumbles 5% to fall below $80,000 for first time since NovemberThe decline comes amid uncertainty over US President Donald Trump's trade policies, regulatory decisions on cryptocurrency, and concerns among investors after a major hack in rival digital currency ether.

Sensex plunges nearly 1,000 points, Nifty tumbles over 1%; IT, auto stocks bleedThe S&P BSE Sensex lost nearly 977.03 points to 73,635.40 at 10:06 am, while the NSE Nifty50 declined 303.60 points to 22,241.45 at 10:06 am.

Karnataka labour department finds no law violation in Infosys layoffs: ReportThe final report is expected to be submitted within a week, and a copy will also be sent to the Union labour department for further review.

Who is Tuhin Kanta Pandey? A look at his key roles in the governmentThe Appointments Committee of the Cabinet (ACC) has approved Tuhin Kanta Pandey's appointment for a term of three years. He is a 1987-batch Indian Administrative Service (IAS) officer from the Odisha cadre.

Tuhin Kanta Pandey appointed new Sebi Chairman, to succeed Madhabi Puri BuchTuhin Kanta Pandey, the current Finance Secretary, has been appointed as the new Chairman of market regulator Sebi. He will succeed Madhabi Puri Buch.

Amazon India hit with $39 million penalty for apparel trademark violationThe lawsuit was filed by Lifestyle Equities, the owner of the Beverly Hills Polo Club (BHPC) horse trademark. It claimed that Amazon India was selling apparel with a similar logo at lower prices.

Fixed vs floating interest rates: Which option to choose?Floating home loan interest rates are usually lower than fixed rates. Hence, they are more appealing when rates are likely to dip or stay stable.
Sensex, Nifty end flat despite banking and financial sector boostThe S&P BSE Sensex added 10.31 points to close at 74,612.43, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 2.50 points to end at 22,545.05.
Sensex, Nifty end flat despite banking and financial sector boostThe S&P BSE Sensex added 10.31 points to close at 74,612.43, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 2.50 points to end at 22,545.05.
Why NPS should be a part of your retirement plan? 5 things to knowWhen compared to fixed deposits (FDs) and Public Provident Funds (PPF), NPS offers superior returns over the long run.

Explained: Why NBFC stocks may offer stability in choppy marketsThe RBI's decision to ease certain loan rules and delay stricter regulations on capital requirements has improved sentiment in the financial sector. This has made NBFC stocks attractive options for investors.

Bitcoin sees 10% drop this week: 5 reasons behind the fallThe largest crypto has witnessed a decline of more than 10% over the last seven days. This downward trend comes amid US President Donald Trump's aggressive trade policies and EU tariff threats.

Government seeks to cut states' share of central taxes: ReportBased on the expected tax collections for the ongoing financial year, a 1% swing in the states' share of tax revenue could give the central government about Rs 3,500 crore.

Sensex, Nifty tumble 4% this month: Should share market investors be worried? Brokerage firm Emkay Global said falling prices make market investors nervous, but there are good signs too. The RBI lowering risk for NBFCs and micro-borrowers helps, and Nifty is now priced better at around 22,500.
Infosys trainees complain to PM's Office over 'forceful' layoffs: ReportThe employees have sought intervention to be reinstated in their jobs and to prevent similar terminations in the future.

Trump Gold Card Visa: 5 key things you need to knowUS President Donald Trump believes the new visa will attract wealthy individuals to the US who will spend large sums, pay high taxes, and boost the economy.

Explained: Why Nuvama cut Spicejet share price target despite profit in Q3SpiceJet attributed its Q3 performance to strong passenger demand, better efficiency, and smarter pricing. In the third quarter, the company's revenue jumped 35% to Rs 1,651 crore, and occupancy stayed at 87%.

Paytm partners with Perplexity for AI-powered search feature on appPaytm says this move is to keep up with growing digital demand. The AI search will work in local languages, making it easier for people to use.

entertainment.headline: Honey Singh returns to Delhi for sold-out Millionaire concert: What to expectYo Yo Honey Singh's Millionaire India Tour hits Delhi with a sold-out show, 20,000 fans, top celebs, and a surprise setlist. His parents will attend the concert, making this emotional homecoming extra special.

Honey Singh wishes to team up with Diljit Dosanjh, urges fans to make it happenSinger Honey Singh, currently touring India for his Millionaire India Tour, expressed his desire to collaborate with Diljit Dosanjh again during his recent concert in Mumbai. He urged fans to tag the Peaches singer, hoping to reunite for a new project.

Shabana Azmi reacts to comparisons between Dabba Cartel and Saas, Bahu Aur FlamingoShabana Azmi addressed concerns over comparisons between her Netflix show Dabba Cartel and Dimple Kapadia's Saas, Bahu Aur Flamingo, emphasising the unique elements of each series.

Singer Palash Sen on Diljit's concert culture remark, Euphoria 2.0 and remixesEuphoria's lead vocalist Palash Sen opened up about Diljit Dosanjh's controversial concert culture remark, the rebranding of the band and more in an exclusive interaction with India Today Digital. Sen recently collaborated with Bollywood star Akshay Kumar on the song, Mahakal Chalo.

Alter Ego review: Blackpink's Lisa's album is versatile and powerfulLisa of Blackpink releases her solo album Alter Ego. With a total of 15 songs and several collaborations, the album has a lot to take away from, but Lisa shines the brightest in her solo elements.

Ek Badnaam Aashram 3 part 2 review: Baba Nirala's journey meets a dramatic endReleased-Thu Feb 27, 2025Prakash Jha's most anticipated series, Aashram Season 3 Part 2, is currently streaming on MX Player. The series focusses on Baba Nirala's fate and how his entire kingdom crashes down because of Pammi's quest for revenge.

Dabba Cartel review: Shabana Azmi is a silent lioness in a challenging storyReleased-Fri Feb 28, 2025'Dabba Cartel' is supposed to be a powerful story of five women who team up to run a cartel in Mumbai. But, the Netflix series ends up becoming a mushy pie.

G-Dragon's Übermensch album is out: A long-overdue masterpieceK-pop King G-Dragon is back with a new album after over a decade. Titled Übermensch, the album is a long-overdue masterpiece the fans deserved.

Japanese woman summoned for kissing BTS' Jin without consentA Japanese woman has been summoned by the South Korean police after she kissed BTS member Jin without his consent during a fan event held last summer.

Suzhal The Vortex 2 review: This crime-drama is trapped in the vortex of clichesReleased-Fri Feb 28, 2025Suzhal - The Vortex 2 review: Created by Pushkar and Gayatri, Suzhal - The Vortex 2 is a crime drama that suffers from overstuffed ideas. The show has interesting ideas, but it gets lost in the overstretched screenplay.

Meghan Markle discusses food, music and Korea in new glimpse of 'With Love, Meghan'Meghan Markle and chef Roy Choi bond over food and the culture of South Korea as they discuss Karoake bars and music in the new promo for her Netflix show, 'With Love, Meghan'.

Composer Pritam thanks Mumbai Police for arresting studio theft culpritMusic composer Pritam expressed gratitude towards the Mumbai Police for capturing the suspect involved in a Rs 40 lakh theft from his studio. He praised their efforts in a heartfelt Instagram post.

The Boys 5: Supernatural actors Jensen Ackles, Jared Padalecki to reuniteThe Boys Season 5 will be an exciting reunion as Soldier Boy Jensen Ackles will be joined by his Supernatural co-stars Jared Padalecki and Misha Collins.

Suits LA review: Sass, swag and secrets in a soggy spin-offReleased-Mon Feb 24, 2025'Suits LA' has the flavour of the original 'Suits', but Teddy Black is no Harvey Spector, and you will be reminded of it, despite all the pizazz in the show.

Oscar-nominated Savan Kotecha to find India's first global boy bandSavan Kotecha is launching a nationwide hunt for India's first global boy band. Partnering with Universal Music, he aims to build a teen pop economy and create Indian stars for the world stage.

Undercover High School review: Korean 'Main Hoon Na' with more thrillsReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025Undercover High School review: It is a thrilling Korean series blending action and comedy, reminiscent of 'Main Hoon Na', where a disgraced spy navigates high school challenges while on a mission to find missing gold.

O Saathi Re: Imtiaz Ali's Netflix series is a modern story with a vintage heartNetflix has released the first look of its new series O Saathi Re, starring Avinash Tiwary, Aditi Rao Hydari, and Arjun Rampal. The series, directed by Arif Ali, will be an 'ode to vintage love in modern times'.

Prajakta Koli hilariously dances to 'Mere Husband Mujhko Piyar…' at sangeet. WatchPrajakta Koli danced to Mere Husband Mujhko Piyar Nahin Karte at her sangeet, leaving guests in splits. She married Vrishank Khanal in Karjat on February 25.

Vijay Yesudas reacts to fake news about father Yesudas's hospitalisationReports were rife that playback singer Yesudas was hospitalised in Chennai due to age-related illness. His son and playback singer Vijay Yesudas exclusively spoke to India Today and shut down the rumours.

Sex Education actor Alexander Westwood jailed for 15 years for sex offencesSex Education actor Alexander Westwood received a 15-year prison sentence for multiple sex offenses. The case has captured widespread media attention due to Westwood's role in the popular Netflix show.

Aashram 3 Part 1 ending explained: Will Pammi's revenge end Baba Nirala's reign?With Aashram Season 3 Part 2 releasing on February 27, let us take a look at how the season ended on a cliffhanger with Baba Nirala's misuse of power and a change in dynamics.

Amit Trivedi says Jasleen Royal's opening act for Coldplay was 'unfortunate'Amit Trivedi, in an interview with India Today Digital, discussed the controversy over Jasleen Royal's opening act for Coldplay's India tour and whether it would impact on the image of Indian artists.

Rapper Kanye West trying to save marriage with Bianca Censori: ReportKanye West is reportedly trying to prevent his marriage with Bianca Censori from ending. An insider reveals that Bianca is considering divorce, and Kanye is panicking.

Singer Palash Sen on working with Akshay Kumar, not being 'accepted' by BollywoodEuphoria's lead vocalist Palash Sen spoke to India Today Digital about collaborating with Bollywood star Akshay Kumar on the song Mahakal Chalo, work opportunities in the Hindi film industry, and more in an exclusive interaction.

Actors Aman Verma and Vandana Lalwani to separate after 9 years of marriageActors Aman Verma and Vandana Lalvani are separating after nine-years of marriage. Amid growing speculation, Aman has addressed the rumours about their relationship.

Baalveer actor Dev Joshi marries girlfriend Aarti, first pics outBaalveer actor Dev Joshi married his girlfriend Aarti in a beautiful ceremony. The wedding festivities, including haldi and mehndi, were spectacular and captured in stunning photos.

Be Happy: Abhishek Bachchan, Inayat Verma series to stream in MarchThe streaming date of Abhishek Bachchan and Inayat Verma-starrer Be Happy is out. It promises to be a touching film about a single father's journey to support his daughter's dream of performing on a dance reality show.

A Man on the Inside: Ted Danson's charming comedy deserves more loveA Man on the Inside is a warm and witty series which tackles multiple subjects, including loss, new beginnings and, well, crime. The Ted Danson-starrer is currently streaming on Netflix.

Shreya Ghoshal on Chikni Chameli: Embarrassed when 5-year-old girls sing itShreya Ghoshal says she feels embarrassed when young girls sing Chikni Chameli, stressing that lyrics should be written more thoughtfully, as music and films have a deep impact on society.

Hina Khan updates fans about cancer treatment: My chemo and surgery are overHina Khan recently gave an update about her cancer treatment. The actor mentioned that her chemotherapy and surgery are over.

Tanmay Bhat jokes about Ranveer Allahbadia ignoring his textsTanmay Bhat hilariously addressed the India's Got Latent controversy, joking about Ranveer Allahbadia ignoring his texts. The reaction video left fellow comedians laughing and also "triggered" them.

Singer Udit Narayan visits Maha Kumbh Mela with wife, expresses gratitude Singer Udit Narayan was among the latest celebrities to visit the holy city of Prayagraj for Maha Kumbh 2025. In an interview with ANI, he expressed his gratitude and congratulated Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath for the well-organised and efficient arrangements.

My Dearest Nemesis review: Chaotic chemistry makes even familiar trope workMy Dearest Nemesis features K-drama stars Moon Ga young and Choi Hyun-wook in the lead. It is available to stream on Viki. Here's our take on the romantic drama.

Internet calls Farah Khan 'insensitive' for mocking Gaurav Khanna's colour blindnessCelebrity MasterChef judge Farah Khan mocked TV actor Gaurav Khanna's colour blindness on the show. Following the same, the internet is outraged by her comments, criticising the filmmaker and calling her 'insensitive'.

Parineeti Chopra gears up for her first Netflix yet-to-be-titled thriller seriesActor Parineeti Chopra is set to make her series OTT debut with a Netflix project. The actor shared a post and informed about sharing screen space with Nimrit Kaur, Soni Razdan, and others.

Tanmay Bhat's X account hacked, comedian warns followersTanmay Bhat's X account recently got hacked, leading to fraudulent messages being posted online. The comedian shared a post on his Instagram and warned his followers.

Prajakta Koli-Vrishank Khanal can't take their eyes off each other in haldi picsActor Prajakta Koli is set to marry longtime boyfriend Vrishank Khanan on February 25. Ahead of the grand day, the actor shared pictures from her haldi function.

Anupam Mittal on India's Got Latent backlash: Not a lost episode of Satyamev JayateAnupam Mittal weighs in on the India's Got Latent row, arguing that YouTube should also be held accountable. He calls Big Tech the real culprit, criticising digital platforms for fueling outrage-driven content.

Bobby Deol says Aashram helped him break industry image, explore new rolesActor Bobby Deol is all set to return as Baba Nirala in Prakash Jha's series, Aashram 3 part 2. The actor confessed that he wanted to step out of his comfort zone.

Waking of Nation trailer: Taaruk Raina fights to prove Jallianwala Bagh was plannedA new show that explores the events surrounding the Jallianwala Bagh massacre is set to premiere on Sony LIV on March 8. Starring Taaruk Raina in the lead role, the series is titled The Waking of a Nation.

general news.headline: Moment Trump-Zelenskyy meet descended into chaos, JD Vance lit the fuseThe meeting started on a good note, with handshakes and smiles between Trump and Zelenskyy. However, all hell broke loose when Vice President JD Vance interjected to answer a question about Trump's support for Russia.

Trump-Zelenskyy meet turns into shouting match, Ukraine President asked to leaveA high-stakes meeting between Zelenskyy and Trump erupted into a fiery confrontation, with shouting, sharp accusations, and an abrupt dismissal that left Washington—and the world—reeling.

Fear of tough divorce, pro-women laws drove him to suicide: Agra man's sisterManav Sharma, an IT firm employee, died by suicide on Febryary 24, allegedly due to strained relations with his wife. Before ending his life, Manav Sharma recorded an emotional video accusing his wife of having an affair.

Zelenskyy goes on thanking spree after Trump showdown over lack of gratitudeAfter being snubbed by both Vance and Trump for not being thankful enough, Zelenskyy went on a thanking spree as leaders from across Europe and Canada poured in their support.

Why don't you wear a suit? Zelenskyy's curt reply to White House reporter's queryOutfitted in a black sweatshirt featuring an embroidered Ukrainian trident, black slacks, and boots, he was considerably underdressed compared to Trump, who was wearing a suit and tie.

Survived murder bid by uncle using yoga skills: Kolkata teen's chilling accountThe 14-year-old, in his statement to the West Bengal Commission for the Protection of Child Rights, said he pretended to be dead until his uncle left the room.

From record highs to a five-month slide: Where are Sensex, Nifty headed?From record highs to relentless losses, Dalal Street's dream run has turned into a nightmare in just a few months. Is there any relief in sight for investors or is there more pain ahead?

Elon Musk welcomes '14th child' as Shivon Zilis reveals birth of their fourthElon Musk has welcomed his '14th child'. His partner, Shivon Zilis, revealed the birth of their son, Seldon, on the birthday of their third child, Arcadia.

Reliving the timeless romance of Mughal-e-Azam, 64 years later, with a musicalThe lights bling, everyone settles down in their seats, curtains are lifted, live music begins and there they are - Saleem and Anarkali - batting their eyelashes, and writing the history of 'Mughal-e-Azam' on the stage. This is Feroz Abbas Khan's musical, a stage adaptation of K Asif's cinematic excellence.

'Miracle Trump didn't hit Zelenskyy': Russia relishes explosive Oval Office fightThe acrimonious shouting match between Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelenskyy was a gift to Moscow, which is working to build ties with Trump's new administration while trying to discredit Zelenskyy and undermine his legitimacy.

47 rescued after Uttarakhand avalanche, 8 still trapped as snow hampers effortsThe rescue operation was halted as night fell, making it even more challenging to locate the remaining workers amid heavy snowfall and the looming threat of more avalanches.

Zelenskyy's olive branch to Trump soon after White House blow up: Sorry for thisUkraine needs a just and lasting peace, and the country is working exactly toward that, Volodymyr Zelenskyy said after his heated argument with US President Donald Trump at the White House.

Mark Zuckerberg's Benson Boone-style surprise for wife's 40th birthday is a hit onlineSharing a video on Instagram, Mark Zuckerberg gave a glimpse of his Benson Boone-style surprise performance for his wife at her 40th birthday party.

Why Yogi Adityanath's ministers are gunning for their own govtPratibha Shukla is the latest cabinet member to go public with grievances, raising questions about cohesion in the administration and putting its image at stake

Vir Das compares breathing in Mumbai to smoking: Today, it was a Marlboro LightVir Das compared Mumbai's air pollution to smoking, calling it a "Marlboro light." Earlier, he had also urged urgent action while warning of the long-term health effects of breathing polluted air.

Sunil Gavaskar slams critics: Stop mourning, your salaries depend on IndiaChampions Trophy 2025: Sunil Gavaskar, speaking to India Today, lashed out at India's critics, saying it has become a habit for overseas pundits to target Rohit Sharma and his team. Former England captains Nasser Hussain and Michael Atherton had claimed that India playing all their matches in Dubai is an 'undeniable advantage'.

Honey Singh returns to Delhi for sold-out Millionaire concert: What to expectYo Yo Honey Singh's Millionaire India Tour hits Delhi with a sold-out show, 20,000 fans, top celebs, and a surprise setlist. His parents will attend the concert, making this emotional homecoming extra special.
Question Time: Weekly News QuizThink you read the headlines this week? Let's test that!

Woman's story not always gospel truth: Court gives bail to man in harassment caseThe observations by Justice P V Kunhikrishnan came while granting anticipatory bail to a man accused of sexually harassing a former woman employee.

How Instagram ruins your plans (and you don't even realise)Sure, it helps discover new places and build itineraries, but Instagram is also responsible for ruining many travel plans - and it does so on multiple levels.

Ancient Indian seafarers used coir-stitched ships to brave high seas. Here's whyA ship stitched together with coir ropes and resins has been launched by India. The ship made with ancient techniques will set sail to Oman this year to celebrate India's maritime excellence of yore. This is why stitched ships were used by ancient Indian seafarers, a tradition that was later borrowed by Yemenis and Omani Arabs.

Actor Gene Hackman and wife likely died 9 days before being found: OfficialHollywood actor Gene Hackman and his wife likely died days before being found at their Santa Fe home. Officials ruled out foul play but are awaiting toxicology reports. The cause of death remains undetermined.

Video: Head in hand, Ukrainian Ambassador watches as Trump-Zelenskyy meet spiralsUkrainian diplomat Oksana Markarova was seen nodding her head and facepalming as a heated clash between Trump and Zelensky over the Russia-Ukraine war unfolded at the White House.

Sunita Ahuja explains why she and Govinda live separatelySunita Ahuja shuts down rumours of divorce with Govinda, clarifying their living arrangements. The actor's lawyer recently confirmed that the couple is 'going strong'.

Kannappa teaser: Prabhas, Akshay Kumar elevate Vishnu Manchu's grand spectacleThe Kannappa teaser introduces Vishnu Manchu as a warrior-turned-devotee of Lord Shiva. With Prabhas, Akshay Kumar, and Mohanlal in key roles, the film promises a grand visual and cinematic experience.

Mika Singh recalls gifting SRK a Rs 50 lakh ring, lending him a car for 3 monthsSinger Mika Singh recalled gifting Shah Rukh Khan a Rs 50 lakh ring, which the actor tried to return. He also revealed that SRK kept his car for three months and shared a fun anecdote from Hrithik Roshan's birthday party.

Vir Das compares breathing in Mumbai to smoking: Today, it was a Marlboro LightVir Das compared Mumbai's air pollution to smoking, calling it a "Marlboro light." Earlier, he had also urged urgent action while warning of the long-term health effects of breathing polluted air.

Reliving the timeless romance of Mughal-e-Azam, 64 years later, with a musicalThe lights bling, everyone settles down in their seats, curtains are lifted, live music begins and there they are - Saleem and Anarkali - batting their eyelashes, and writing the history of 'Mughal-e-Azam' on the stage. This is Feroz Abbas Khan's musical, a stage adaptation of K Asif's cinematic excellence.

sports.headline: KL Rahul: I won't play to please critics, but open to valid feedbackKL Rahul addressed criticism about his strike rate, saying he considers valid feedback but prioritises playing for the team's needs. He also discussed his flexible batting position in ODIs and his role as India's first-choice wicketkeeper in the Champions Trophy.

Matthew Short doubtful for Australia's Champions Trophy semi-final: SmithAustralia opener Matthew Short is doubtful for the Champions Trophy semi-final due to a quad injury. Skipper Steve Smith admitted concerns over Short's match fitness, with Jake Fraser-McGurk, Aaron Hardie, and Cooper Connolly in contention as potential replacements.

Watch: Lahore groundsman slips, falls while clearing waterlogged field Champions Trophy 2025: The groundsmen at the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore had a tough time clearing the outfield during the match between Afghanistan and Australia on Friday. Australia qualified for the semi-final after the match was called off.

Lionel Messi blames tough times at PSG as major push for Inter Miami moveLionel Messi revealed that his challenging stint at PSG influenced his move to Inter Miami. Struggles in Paris, Champions League failures, and fan criticism pushed him toward a fresh start, where he is now thriving in Major League Soccer.

Virat Kohli vs Sachin Tendulkar: Sanjay Manjrekar names best ever ODI batterSanjay Manjrekar praised Virat Kohli's dominance in run chases, highlighting his superior numbers over Sachin Tendulkar. Kohli's Champions Trophy century against Pakistan has reignited hopes for India's ODI success, further cementing his legacy as the ultimate chase master.

Mondo Duplantis breaks pole vault world record for 11th time Sweden's Mondo Duplantis set the world record in pole vault for the 11th time with an attempt of 6.27 metres at the All Star Perche meet in Clermont-Ferrand, France on Friday, February 28.

Shami makes me look brilliant behind the stumps: KL RahulKL Rahul praised Mohammed Shami's lethal swing, admitting he often had to dive full stretch behind the stumps. With many speculating on whether India would consider resting Shami for the New Zealand clash, his importance to the team remains undeniable.

Pant in, KL Rahul rested vs NZ? India assistant coach ten Doeschate answersWith India and New Zealand already in the Champions Trophy semi-finals, assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate discussed the team's wicketkeeping dilemma, sparking debate over whether Rishabh Pant should replace KL Rahul in their final group-stage match.

Who will India play in the Champions Trophy semi-final? Scenarios explainedChampions Trophy 2025: Australia became the third team after India and New Zealand to qualify for the semi-finals. India will learn their semi-final opponents after their final Group A game against New Zealand.

Watch: MS Dhoni hits huge sixes on Day 1 of CSK's pre-season camp in ChennaiIPL 2025: MS Dhoni was seen hitting a few big shots on Day 1 of Chennai Super Kings' 10-day training camp at their High Performance Center. Dhoni and R Ashwin were the centre of attraction as the Super Kings trained in the evening session.

Shami makes me look brilliant behind the stumps: KL RahulKL Rahul praised Mohammed Shami's lethal swing, admitting he often had to dive full stretch behind the stumps. With many speculating on whether India would consider resting Shami for the New Zealand clash, his importance to the team remains undeniable.

Pant in, KL Rahul rested vs NZ? India assistant coach ten Doeschate answersWith India and New Zealand already in the Champions Trophy semi-finals, assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate discussed the team's wicketkeeping dilemma, sparking debate over whether Rishabh Pant should replace KL Rahul in their final group-stage match.

Who will India play in the Champions Trophy semi-final? Scenarios explainedChampions Trophy 2025: Australia became the third team after India and New Zealand to qualify for the semi-finals. India will learn their semi-final opponents after their final Group A game against New Zealand.

Watch: MS Dhoni hits huge sixes on Day 1 of CSK's pre-season camp in ChennaiIPL 2025: MS Dhoni was seen hitting a few big shots on Day 1 of Chennai Super Kings' 10-day training camp at their High Performance Center. Dhoni and R Ashwin were the centre of attraction as the Super Kings trained in the evening session.

Can England help Afghanistan qualify for the semi-finals in Jos Buttler's swansong?England play South Africa in the final group-stage game of Group B in the Champions Trophy. The fate of two teams is riding on this match. There is a slim chance that if South Africa lose badly to England, they would be knocked out of the tournament.

All-round Delhi hammer Mumbai by 9 wickets to go top of the tableDelhi Capitals hammered Mumbai Indians by 9 wickets to go top of the table in the Women's Premier League 2025. Chasing 124 runs, Meg Lanning and Shafali Verma put in a clinical show with tha bat to secure the win.

Jos Buttler is a World Cup-winning captain, nobody can take that away: McCullumEngland head coach Brendon McCullum praised Jos Buttler's selfless attitude after the latter stepped down from captaincy. McCullum said that no one can take away the fact that Buttler is a World Cup winning captain.

KL Rahul on Virat Kohli 300: Wish him many more hundreds and years of cricket Champions Trophy: Speaking ahead of India's final Group A game against New Zealand, KL Rahul spoke about his competition with Rishabh Pant, the challenge of taking on New Zealand and Virat Kohli's upcoming landmark of 300 ODIs for India.

McCullum feeling 'incredibly sad' for Jos Buttler amidst captaincy debacleEngland head coach Brendon McCullum feels incredibly sad for Jos Buttler who decided to resign as the captain of England on Friday, February 28. Buttler left captaincy after his team was knocked out of the Champions Trophy 2025.

No point dwelling on it: New Zealand star on India's Dubai advantageChampions Trophy 2025: New Zealand spinner Michael Bracewell acknowledged that India playing all their games in Dubai is an advantage. However, the 34-year-old said New Zealand are eager to embrace the challenge of facing Rohit Sharma's men on Sunday.

Barcelona vs Real Madrid, El Clasico Legends match: All you need to knowThe legends of FC Barcelona and Real Madrid are set to play in India on April 6. Legendary players like Figo and Rivaldo are set to participate in the exhibition game.

Sunil Gavaskar slams critics: Stop mourning, your salaries depend on IndiaChampions Trophy 2025: Sunil Gavaskar, speaking to India Today, lashed out at India's critics, saying it has become a habit for overseas pundits to target Rohit Sharma and his team. Former England captains Nasser Hussain and Michael Atherton had claimed that India playing all their matches in Dubai is an 'undeniable advantage'.

McCullum feeling 'incredibly sad' for Jos Buttler amidst captaincy debacleEngland head coach Brendon McCullum feels incredibly sad for Jos Buttler who decided to resign as the captain of England on Friday, February 28. Buttler left captaincy after his team was knocked out of the Champions Trophy 2025.

However, the 34-year-old said New Zealand are eager to embrace the challenge of facing Rohit Sharma's men on Sunday.

Barcelona vs Real Madrid, El Clasico Legends match: All you need to knowThe legends of FC Barcelona and Real Madrid are set to play in India on April 6. Legendary players like Figo and Rivaldo are set to participate in the exhibition game.

Sunil Gavaskar slams critics: Stop mourning, your salaries depend on IndiaChampions Trophy 2025: Sunil Gavaskar, speaking to India Today, lashed out at India's critics, saying it has become a habit for overseas pundits to target Rohit Sharma and his team. Former England captains Nasser Hussain and Michael Atherton had claimed that India playing all their matches in Dubai is an 'undeniable advantage'.

Hosts Pakistan slammed after 30 minutes of rain washes out Group B gameHost Pakistan was slammed by fans on social media on Friday, after another game in the Champions Trophy got washed out on Friday. Afghanistan vs Australia was abandoned after just 30 minutes of rainfall in Lahore.

Australia in semis after 15 years, Afghanistan all but out after rain spoils playAustralia (AUS) vs Afghanistan (AFG), Champions Trophy 2025: Australia made it to the semi-final of the tournament for the first time since 2009. Australia were racing at 109 for 1 in 12.5 overs, chasing 274, when rain played spoilsport in Lahore on Friday, February 28.

AUS vs AFG: Who will qualify from Group B if rain washes out match in LahoreRain came pelting down in the Afghanistan and Australia match in Lahore on Friday, February 28. If the match gets washed out, who will qualify for the semi-finals in Group B?

KL Rahul admits to competition with Rishabh Pant for place in ODI teamKL Rahul has admitted to competition with Rishabh Pant in the ODI team. Rahul has revealed that there is always a temptation for the coach and the captain to play the aggressive Pant ahead of him.

Jos Buttler resigns as England's white-ball captain after Champions Trophy debacleChampions Trophy: Jos Buttler stepped down as England's ODI and T20I captain, days after the team lost to Afghanistan in their Group B match. England faced an embarassing early exit from the marquee eight-team tournament in Pakistan.

Wasim Akram responds to Yograj Singh's criticism: Available free for Pakistan cricketFormer Pakistan fast bowler Wasim Akram said he is willing to work with the Pakistan cricket team, but ruled out a full-time role. Akram's comment comes after Yograj Singh slammed former Pakistan cricketers for speaking too much and not taking efforts to help a struggling national team.

SA vs ENG: Heinrich Klaasen fit for match vs England, says coach Rob WalterSouth Africa head coach Rob Walter has said that wicketkeeper batter Heinrich Klaasen will return to the side for their group-stage match against England. Klaasen missed the first match against Afghanistan due to an elbow injury.

Worrying about India's advantages not our job: South Africa coach Rob WalterSouth Africa coach Rob Walter refused to entertain questions about India's alleged advantage in the Champions Trophy 2025. Walter, speaking ahead of their match against England, said that he did not want to spend energy thinking about the Indian team.

Vidarbha take crucial lead vs Kerala despite Sachin Baby's 98 Ranji Trophy 2024-25: Sachin Baby scored 98 runs, but Kerala conceded a lead of 37 runs at the end of the first innings against Vidarbha at the VCA Stadium in Nagpur.

Jasprit Bumrah catches up with Jemimah in heartfelt interactionWPL 2025: Jemimah Rodrigues had the chance to interact with Jasprit Bumrah. Jemimah has had her ups and downs in the ongoing tournament with three single-figure scores to her name.

Feels odd: R Ashwin delighted to return to Chennai Super KingsIPL 2025: R Ashwin said that he 'felt odd' after returning to the Chennai Super Kings after nine wickets. CSK bought Ashwin for Rs 9.75 crore in the auction for the upcoming season.

Shubman Gill ends injury speculation, trains for 2 hours ahead of IND vs NZ clashShubman Gill ended speculation around his participation in the India vs New Zealand clash as he trained for 2 hours in Dubai on Thursday, February 27. Gill was the only one to miss the practice session on February 26, and he decided to spend some time in the nets on Thursday.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
